name: Play It Again Spam
description:
A tiny PI travels back in time to    fight internet trolls (aka Trumplestiltskin , Rasputinbot and Mark Reptoidenberg) on top of a  1920 typewriter.   Can Spam Bradley save the internet from running out of space by  using his unique knowledge of kungfu and chess?

This game was created for the 2021 Epic Unreal MegaJam #unrealjam

To watch a  behind the scenes video of making this game, please visit   https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLgXsVlWXVP5ISRSbieHWuPfYP6k24AV0d

Based on the idea of a mission being run out of  the space bar on a  keyboard.

All assets made during Epic MegaJam by Andrew Bluff (Rollerchimp)*

*Except:

  • Typewriter font by Fredrick Brennan 
  • Typewriter key sound from Snapsound
  • Character models were created with Character Creator 3   including Essential Clothing, Professional Clothing,Realistic Human Skin, Assassins coat, Realistic Anatomy and Headshot
